parameters.jsCode:
// NOTE: n8n Code nodes do not expose workflow nodes for dynamic discovery.
// Keep this list in sync or extract to a shared snippet if you copy it elsewhere.
const nodeNames = [
  "02 Verify Credentials",
  "03 View Profile",
  "04 Account Followers",
  "05 Account Following",
  "06 Account Statuses",
  "07 Account Lists",
  "08 Account Featured Tags",
  "09 Add Note To Account",
  "10 Pin Account",
  "11 Unpin Account Cleanup",
  "12 Account Unmute",
  "13 Search Accounts",
  "14 Create Status",
  "15 View Status",
  "16 Edit Status",
  "17 Status Context",
  "18 Add Bookmark",
  "19 Get Bookmarks",
  "20 Remove Bookmark Cleanup",
  "21 Favourite Status",
  "22 Get Favourites",
  "23 Unfavourite Status Cleanup",
  "24 Create List",
  "25 Get Lists",
  "26 Get List",
  "27 Update List",
  "28 Add Accounts To List",
  "29 Get Accounts In List",
  "30 Remove Accounts From List Cleanup",
  "31 Create Filter",
  "32 Update Filter",
  "33 Delete Filter Cleanup",
  "34 Block Account",
  "35 Unblock Account Cleanup",
  "36 Mute Account",
  "37 Unmute Account Cleanup",
  "38 Feature Tag",
  "39 Get Featured Tags",
  "40 Unfeature Tag Cleanup",
  "41 Follow Tag",
  "42 Get Tag",
  "43 Unfollow Tag Cleanup",
  "44 Home Timeline",
  "45 Public Timeline",
  "46 Hashtag Timeline",
  "47 Public Timeline (Link Fallback)",
  "48 List Timeline",
  "49 Search",
  "50 Notifications Get",
  "51 Notifications Unread Count",
  "52 Notifications Dismiss",
  "53 Conversations Get",
  "54 Conversations Mark Read",
  "55 Conversations Remove",
  "56 Follow Requests List",
  "57 Follow Requests Authorize",
  "58 Follow Requests Reject",
  "59 Suggestions Get",
  "60 Suggestions Remove",
  "61 Instance Server Info",
  "62 Preferences",
  "63 Custom Emojis",
  "64 Directory",
  "65 Endorsements",
  "66 Announcements",
  "67 Followed Tags",
  "68 Domain Blocks Block",
  "69 Domain Blocks Unblock Cleanup",
  "70 Allowed Domains List",
  "71 Allowed Domains Get",
  "72 Blocked Domains List",
  "73 Blocked Domains Get",
  "74 Blocked Domains Block",
  "75 Email Blocked Domains List",
  "76 Email Blocked Domains Get",
  "77 Email Block Domain",
  "78 Apps Register",
  "79 Apps Verify Credentials",
  "80 Auth Register App",
  "81 Auth Obtain Token",
  "82 Auth Revoke Token",
  "83 Reports Create",
  "84 Reports Resolve Cleanup",
  "85 Reports List",
  "86 Markers Get",
  "87 Markers Save",
  "88 Measures List",
  "89 Measures Get Metrics",
  "90 Retention Stats",
  "91 Cohorts Retention",
  "92 Dimensions List",
  "93 Dimensions Get",
  "94 IPs List",
  "95 IPs Get",
  "96 Canonical Email Blocks List",
  "97 Canonical Email Blocks Get",
  "98 Scheduled Statuses List",
  "99 Scheduled Statuses View",
  "100 Scheduled Statuses Update",
  "101 Scheduled Statuses Cancel",
  "102 Emails Resend Confirmation",
  "103 oEmbed Fetch",
  "104 Proofs List",
  "105 Poll View",
  "106 Poll Vote",
  "107 Media Update",
  "108 Streaming Public",
  "109 Streaming Hashtag",
  "110 Streaming User",
  "111 Push Subscribe",
  "112 Push Get",
  "113 Push Update",
  "114 Push Remove Cleanup",
  "115 Profile Delete Avatar",
  "116 Profile Delete Header",
  "117 Delete List Cleanup",
  "118 Delete Status Cleanup"
];

// Operations that can validly return an empty object on success.
const allowEmptyPayloadNodes = new Set([
  "05 Account Following",
  "07 Account Lists",
  "08 Account Featured Tags",
  "10 Pin Account",
  "11 Unpin Account Cleanup",
  "20 Remove Bookmark Cleanup",
  "28 Add Accounts To List",
  "30 Remove Accounts From List Cleanup",
  "33 Delete Filter Cleanup",
  "35 Unblock Account Cleanup",
  "37 Unmute Account Cleanup",
  "40 Unfeature Tag Cleanup",
  "45 Public Timeline",
  "47 Public Timeline (Link Fallback)",
  "48 List Timeline",
  "50 Notifications Get",
  "51 Notifications Unread Count",
  "53 Conversations Get",
  "56 Follow Requests List",
  "65 Endorsements",
  "66 Announcements",
  "68 Domain Blocks Block",
  "69 Domain Blocks Unblock Cleanup",
  "85 Reports List",
  "86 Markers Get",
  "88 Measures List",
  "89 Measures Get Metrics",
  "90 Retention Stats",
  "117 Delete List Cleanup",
  "118 Delete Status Cleanup"
]);

const results = [];

for (const nodeName of nodeNames) {
  let nodeItems;
  try {
    nodeItems = $items(nodeName, 0, 0);
  } catch (e) {
    results.push({
      test: nodeName,
      status: 'NOT_EXECUTED',
      itemCount: 0,
      errorCount: 1,
      errors: [String(e)],
      items: [],
    });
    continue;
  }

  const itemResults = (nodeItems || []).map((item, index) => {
    const json = item?.json ?? {};
    const statusCode = typeof json.statusCode === 'number' ? json.statusCode : undefined;
    const errorMessages = [];

    if (json.message) errorMessages.push(String(json.message));
    if (json.errorMessage) errorMessages.push(String(json.errorMessage));
    if (json.error) {
      if (json.error.message) {
        errorMessages.push(String(json.error.message));
      } else if (typeof json.error === 'string') {
        errorMessages.push(json.error);
      } else {
        errorMessages.push(JSON.stringify(json.error));
      }
    }
    if (statusCode !== undefined && statusCode >= 400) {
      errorMessages.push('HTTP ' + statusCode);
    }

    const isEmptyPayload = json && typeof json === 'object' && Object.keys(json).length === 0;
    if (isEmptyPayload && !allowEmptyPayloadNodes.has(nodeName)) {
      errorMessages.push('EMPTY_PAYLOAD');
    }

    const isAllowedEmpty = isEmptyPayload && allowEmptyPayloadNodes.has(nodeName);
    const hasError = errorMessages.length > 0;

    return {
      index,
      status: hasError ? 'FAIL' : (isAllowedEmpty ? 'PASS_EMPTY_OK' : 'PASS'),
      error: hasError ? errorMessages.join(' | ') : null,
      keys: Object.keys(json).slice(0, 10),
    };
  });

  const errors = itemResults.filter(r => r.status === 'FAIL').map(r => r.error).filter(Boolean);

  results.push({
    test: nodeName,
    status: errors.length > 0 ? 'FAIL' : 'PASS',
    itemCount: itemResults.length,
    errorCount: errors.length,
    errors,
    items: itemResults,
  });
}

const passed = results.filter(r => r.status === 'PASS').length;
const failed = results.filter(r => r.status === 'FAIL').length;
const notExecuted = results.filter(r => r.status === 'NOT_EXECUTED').length;
const totalErrors = results.reduce((sum, r) => sum + (r.errorCount || 0), 0);
const totalItems = results.reduce((sum, r) => sum + (r.itemCount || 0), 0);

return [{
  json: {
    summary: {
      totalTests: results.length,
      passed,
      failed,
      notExecuted,
      totalErrors,
      totalItems,
      successRate: results.length ? Number(((passed / results.length) * 100).toFixed(2)) : 0,
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
    },
    results,
  },
}];
